mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 PA. AVE, P.O. Box 655, Washington City, D.C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of visitors on the east lawn. The photograph has been pasted to a cardboard mount. Reverse of the photograph indicates the picture was taken 'Apr. 8 - 1 (group 1)' and includes the preprinted instructions for ordering an image from the photographer: Order for duplicates of Photographic Groups, taken at Mount Vernon, can be had by stating the day of the month and the number of the Group. Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 PA. AVE, P.O. Box 655, Washington City, D.C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Visitors
